agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM Thursday, March 14, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Pending Business from the Thursday, March 7th meeting, as well as the posted agenda. The following nominees will appear: Board of the Texas Department of Motor Vehicles John Marshall Prewitt Appointed 07-30-18 for a Bettencourt Harris County term to expire 02-01-23 Midwestern State University Board of Regents Guy A. Fidelie Appointed 09-20-18 for a Fallon Wichita County term to expire 02-25-24 Texas Southern University Board of Regents Hasan Mack Appointed 04-23-18 for a Buckingham Travis County term to expire 02-01-23 University of Houston System Board of Regents Jack B. Moore Appointed 03-12-18 for a Bettencourt Harris County term to expire 08-31-23 University of North Texas System Board of Regents Milton B. Lee Appointed 06-04-18 for a Menéndez Bexar County term to expire 05-22-23 The following nominees will not appear: Angelina and Neches River Authority Board of Directors Patricia E. Dickey Appointed 11-14-18 for a Nichols Houston County term to expire 09-05-23 Donnie Ray Kee Appointed 11-14-18 for a Nichols Angelina County term to expire 09-05-23 Virginia M.
